version_description:
Technical update:
- added adjustment of the handbrake position;
- added an option to fully mute the game sound;
- the necessary points for the Beginner's League reduced;
- interface buttons slightly improved;
- Thai language added.

Technical update:
- added adjustment of the handbrake position;
- added an option to fully mute the game sound;
- the necessary points for the Beginner's League reduced;
- interface buttons slightly improved;
- Thai language added.

BIG UPDATE
------------------------------------
- A new League is opened - AMATEUR
- New secret cars added
- Improved graphics of all tracks
- New interface in all races
- Settings menus has been redesigned
- Buttons position setting added
- Fine-tune of steering and accelerometer
- Tachometer added for additional beauty
- Smoke from the wheels redone
- Fixed problems with sound
- Other small bugs fixed
- Performance optimization
-------------------------------------

BIG UPDATE
------------------------------------
- A new League is opened - AMATEUR
- New secret cars added
- Improved graphics of all tracks
- New interface in all races
- Settings menus has been redesigned
- Buttons position setting added
- Fine-tune of steering and accelerometer
- Tachometer added for additional beauty
- Smoke from the wheels redone
- Fixed problems with sound
- Other small bugs fixed
- Performance optimization
-------------------------------------

BIG UPDATE -->
+ a new Professional League opened!
+ added new tracks!
+ added 3 legendary cars!
+ novelty - dynamic obstacles
+ turn signs
+ improved unlock of secret machines
+ performance optimization

BIG UPDATE -->
+ a new Professional League opened!
+ added new tracks!
+ added 3 legendary cars!
+ novelty - dynamic obstacles
+ turn signs
+ improved unlock of secret machines
+ performance optimization

HOTFIX and big addition:
- fixed problems in the tasks of the Prof League
- Prof League significantly re-balanced
- PHOTO mode! Now you can view your car
- make screenshots and share them with everyone
- light re-done on all tracks = less drama
- fixed bugs with obstacles = be warned
- fixed game crashes on some devices
- completely reworked sound = listen
- minor bugs fixed
- performance optimized for powerful devices
- application weight significantly reduced

HOTFIX and big addition:
- fixed problems in the tasks of the Prof League
- Prof League significantly re-balanced
- PHOTO mode! Now you can view your car
- make screenshots and share them with everyone
- light re-done on all tracks = less drama
- fixed bugs with obstacles = be warned
- fixed game crashes on some devices
- completely reworked sound = listen
- minor bugs fixed
- performance optimized for powerful devices
- application weight significantly reduced

- 3 new tracks added to the Practice mode
- fixed bugs with saving photos
- Ads scheme changed
- fps lock returned for weak devices
- minor improvements and corrections

- 3 new tracks added to the Practice mode
- fixed bugs with saving photos
- Ads scheme changed
- fps lock returned for weak devices
- minor improvements and corrections

+ improved PHOTO mode, camera tilts
+ Added PHOTO mode during race
+ improved performance for iPhone 6S and 6S PLUS
+ added a visual drift timer
+ added speed measurement in miles
+ full compatibility with iOS11
+ minor bugs fixed
+ performance optimization

+ improved PHOTO mode, camera tilts
+ Added PHOTO mode during race
+ improved performance for iPhone 6S and 6S PLUS
+ added a visual drift timer
+ added speed measurement in miles
+ full compatibility with iOS11
+ minor bugs fixed
+ performance optimization

BIG UPDATE! Everything from your wish list:
- now you can record and share videos of your races
- a new challenge added: starting from November 20 daily Events will be opened
- prizes in daily Events are tuning components and secret cars
- the system of penalties has been changed: from now you will not lose all the points in a collision
- added a system of markers which makes selection of car for a race easier
- improved presentation of prizes unlock
- car packs in Special Offers section were enlarged
- mass of minor improvements and corrections

BIG UPDATE! Everything from your wish list:
- now you can record and share videos of your races
- a new challenge added: starting from November 20 daily Events will be opened
- prizes in daily Events are tuning components and secret cars
- the system of penalties has been changed: from now you will not lose all the points in a collision
- added a system of markers which makes selection of car for a race easier
- improved presentation of prizes unlock
- car packs in Special Offers section were enlarged
- mass of minor improvements and corrections

BIG update:
- player registration/progress
- driver added to all cars
- image quality settings
- ads removed when navigating between screens
- entry-level cars were rebalanced
- fixed bugs with car's descriptions
- fixed bugs in Events
- fixed bugs in Professional League
- interface improvements
+ many minor improvements and bugfixes

BIG update:
- player registration/progress
- driver added to all cars
- image quality settings
- ads removed when navigating between screens
- entry-level cars were rebalanced
- fixed bugs with car's descriptions
- fixed bugs in Events
- fixed bugs in Professional League
- interface improvements
+ many minor improvements and bugfixes
IMPORTANT UPDATE: According to your numerous requests we made GHOST MULTIPLAYER! Now, in a hard struggle, you can find out whose kung fu is steeper. Join us!

- Fixed problems with missing control buttons
- Added headlights and brake lights
- Your nickname added to the car's rear window
- Replay filmed by drone added to the Career mode - make your epic videos!
- Fixed mass of minor bugs between the game client and server
- NEW CYCLE OF DAILY EVENTS - waiting for the 18th of December!

+ various bugs fixed

Long-awaited update!
New weekly events, perfect for experienced players.
Over 40 new races and new secret cars!
Pro Events is a tough competition. Those who pass it within a week will receive a legendary car.
Burn rubber!
